alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Macon; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 28 at 8:05PM CDT until March 29 at 10:07AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Tallapoosa River At Milstead affecting Macon, Elmore and Montgomery Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tallapoosa River Basin and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by Wednesday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Tallapoosa River At Milstead. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 42.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 PM CDT Tuesday was 46.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning and continue falling to 10.3 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
